channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
@rozzie @mkapor Also @borthwick -- I spent all last year working on Drummer. Powerful product for exactly what you're doing. This is a rich area with a lot of history. Let's do this right, and make it all work better not reinvent.

So much to say, but let's start here..

https://t.co/yYkHcrwgNf

@rozzie @mkapor @Borthwick This feels like deja vu. I think we've been here before, with each of you at one time or another. ;-)

@rozzie @mkapor @Borthwick You should definitely get @stevenbjohnson in the loop.

https://t.co/SK2PyRvkFr

I believe he was involved early-on with @RoamResearch (which you should also have in there).

Also @logseq, great team, loved them so much I invested. ;-)

@rozzie @mkapor @Borthwick It also feels like there's an echo in here. ;-)

@jeffjarvis Jeff, I agree with you on almost everything -- but not this.

There are plenty of middle class and upper middle class people who vote Republican, still.

Definitely not trailer trash.

I meet them in various contexts.

@jeffjarvis Hard to believe educated well-off people don't see the danger, but I have to say I used to vote Republican myself, in the 80s and 90s.
Daily crossword puzzles free from The Washington Post. #free https://t.co/Esn5WqqlvI
item.source:markdown: Daily crossword puzzles free from The Washington Post. #free https://t.co/Esn5WqqlvI
